name: The Act of Saving
description:
This game was made for the Games for Change Student Competition 2021. The theme was Advocating for Animals, and I also chose to make it accessible for those with visual or auditory impairments.

Headphones recommended. 

The art, programming, music, and voice-over were all made by me.

Resources

This game was made in Construct 3. The art was made in Piskel, and the music was made in Beepbox.co.
